verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> The word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me again saying

מַה־ <WH4100> What לָּכֶ֗ם אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you מֹֽשְׁלִים֙ <WH4911> What mean ye that ye use אֶת־ <WH853> הַמָּשָׁ֣ל <WH4912> this proverb הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this עַל־ <WH5921> concerning אַדְמַ֥ת <WH127> concerning the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אָבוֹת֙ <WH1> The fathers יֹ֣אכְלוּ <WH398> have eaten בֹ֔סֶר <WH1155> sour grapes וְשִׁנֵּ֥י <WH8127> teeth הַבָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> and the children's תִּקְהֶֽינָה׃ <WH6949> are set on edge

חַי־ <WH2416> [As] I live אָ֕נִי <WH589> I נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD אִם־ <WH518> are surely יִֽהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> become לָכֶ֜ם ע֗וֹד <WH5750> anymore מְשֹׁ֛ל <WH4911> ye shall not have [occasion] any more to use הַמָּשָׁ֥ל <WH4912> this proverb הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> in Israel

הֵ֤ן <WH2005> Behold כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַנְּפָשׁוֹת֙ <WH5315> Behold all souls לִ֣י הֵ֔נָּה <WH2007> in כְּנֶ֧פֶשׁ <WH5315> are mine as the soul הָאָ֛ב <WH1> of the father וּכְנֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> so also the soul הַבֵּ֖ן <WH1121> of the son לִי־ הֵ֑נָּה <WH2007> in הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> is mine the soul הַחֹטֵ֖את <WH2398> that sinneth הִ֥יא <WH1931> he תָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> it shall die ס
וְאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> But if a man כִּי־ <WH3588> if יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> be just וְעָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> and do מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> that which is lawful וּצְדָקָֽה׃ <WH6666> and right

אֶל־ <WH413> at הֶֽהָרִים֙ <WH2022> upon the mountains לֹ֣א <WH3808> and does not אָכָ֔ל <WH398> [And] hath not eaten וְעֵינָיו֙ <WH5869> his eyes לֹ֣א <WH3808> or נָשָׂ֔א <WH5375> neither hath lifted up אֶל־ <WH413> to גִּלּוּלֵ֖י <WH1544> to the idols בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֵ֤שֶׁת <WH802> wife רֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7453> his neighbour's לֹ֣א <WH3808> or טִמֵּ֔א <WH2930> neither hath defiled וְאֶל־ <WH413> about אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> woman נִדָּ֖ה <WH5079> to a menstruous לֹ֥א <WH3808> or יִקְרָֽב׃ <WH7126> neither hath come near

וְאִישׁ֙ <WH376> any לֹ֣א <WH3808> does not יוֹנֶ֔ה <WH3238> And hath not oppressed חֲבֹלָת֥וֹ <WH2258> his pledge חוֹב֙ <WH2326> to the debtor יָשִׁ֔יב <WH7725> [but] hath restored גְּזֵלָ֖ה <WH1500> none by violence לֹ֣א <WH3808> does not יִגְזֹ֑ל <WH1497> hath spoiled לַחְמוֹ֙ <WH3899> his bread לְרָעֵ֣ב <WH7457> to the hungry יִתֵּ֔ן <WH5414> hath given וְעֵירֹ֖ם <WH5903> the naked יְכַסֶּה־ <WH3680> and hath covered בָּֽגֶד׃ <WH899> with a garment

בַּנֶּ֣שֶׁךְ <WH5392> upon usury לֹֽא־ <WH3808> does not יִתֵּ֗ן <WH5414> He [that] hath not given forth וְתַרְבִּית֙ <WH8636> any increase לֹ֣א <WH3808> or יִקָּ֔ח <WH3947> neither hath taken מֵעָ֖וֶל <WH5766> from iniquity יָשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> [that] hath withdrawn יָד֑וֹ <WH3027> his hand מִשְׁפַּ֤ט <WH4941> judgment אֱמֶת֙ <WH571> true. יַֽעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> hath executed בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> between man לְאִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> and man

בְּחֻקּוֹתַ֧י <WH2708> in my statutes יְהַלֵּ֛ךְ <WH1980> Hath walked וּמִשְׁפָּטַ֥י <WH4941> my judgments שָׁמַ֖ר <WH8104> and hath kept לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> to deal אֱמֶ֑ת <WH571> truly צַדִּ֥יק <WH6662> he [is] just הוּא֙ <WH1931> he חָיֹ֣ה <WH2421> he shall surely יִֽחְיֶ֔ה <WH2421> live נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD

וְהוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> If he beget בֵּן־ <WH1121> a son פָּרִ֖יץ <WH6530> [that is] a robber שֹׁפֵ֣ךְ <WH8210> a shedder דָּ֑ם <WH1818> of blood וְעָ֣שָׂה <WH6213> and [that] doeth אָ֔ח <WH251> the like מֵאַחַ֖ד <WH259> to [any] one מֵאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> of these

וְה֕וּא <WH1931> himself אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> any אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> of these לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> And that doeth כִּ֣י <WH3588> for גַ֤ם <WH1571> again אֶל־ <WH413> at הֶֽהָרִים֙ <WH2022> upon the mountains אָכַ֔ל <WH398> not any of those [duties] but even hath eaten וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> wife רֵעֵ֖הוּ <WH7453> his neighbour's טִמֵּֽא׃ <WH2930> and defiled

עָנִ֤י <WH6041> the poor וְאֶבְיוֹן֙ <WH34> and needy הוֹנָ֔ה <WH3238> Hath oppressed גְּזֵל֣וֹת <WH1500> by violence גָּזָ֔ל <WH1497> hath spoiled חֲבֹ֖ל <WH2258> the pledge לֹ֣א <WH3808> does not יָשִׁ֑יב <WH7725> hath not restored וְאֶל־ <WH413> to הַגִּלּוּלִים֙ <WH1544> to the idols נָשָׂ֣א <WH5375> and hath lifted up עֵינָ֔יו <WH5869> his eyes תּוֹעֵבָ֖ה <WH8441> abomination עָשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> hath committed

בַּנֶּ֧שֶׁךְ <WH5392> upon usury נָתַ֛ן <WH5414> Hath given forth וְתַרְבִּ֥ית <WH8636> increase לָקַ֖ח <WH3947> and hath taken וָחָ֑י <WH2425> shall he then live לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not יִֽחְיֶ֗ה <WH2421> ? he shall not live אֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַתּוֹעֵב֤וֹת <WH8441> all these abominations הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> these עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> he hath done מ֣וֹת <WH4191> he shall surely יוּמָ֔ת <WH4191> die דָּמָ֖יו <WH1818> his blood בּ֥וֹ יִהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> become

וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> now behold הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> Now lo [if] he beget בֵּ֔ן <WH1121> a son וַיַּ֕רְא <WH7200> that seeth אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all חַטֹּ֥את <WH2403> sins אָבִ֖יו <WH1> all his father's אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> which he hath done וַיִּרְאֶ֕ה <WH7200> and considereth וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> does not יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> and doeth כָּהֵֽן׃ <WH2004> not such like

עַל־ <WH5921> at הֶֽהָרִים֙ <WH2022> upon the mountains לֹ֣א <WH3808> does not אָכָ֔ל <WH398> [That] hath not eaten וְעֵינָיו֙ <WH5869> his eyes לֹ֣א <WH3808> or נָשָׂ֔א <WH5375> neither hath lifted up אֶל־ <WH413> to גִּלּוּלֵ֖י <WH1544> to the idols בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> אֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> wife רֵעֵ֖הוּ <WH7453> his neighbour's לֹ֥א <WH3808> or טִמֵּֽא׃ <WH2930> hath not defiled

וְאִישׁ֙ <WH376> any לֹ֣א <WH3808> or הוֹנָ֔ה <WH3238> Neither hath oppressed חֲבֹל֙ <WH2258> the pledge לֹ֣א <WH3808> or חָבָ֔ל <WH2254> hath not withholden וּגְזֵלָ֖ה <WH1500> by violence לֹ֣א <WH3808> or גָזָ֑ל <WH1497> neither hath spoiled לַחְמוֹ֙ <WH3899> his bread לְרָעֵ֣ב <WH7457> to the hungry נָתָ֔ן <WH5414> [but] hath given וְעֵר֖וֹם <WH5903> the naked כִּסָּה־ <WH3680> and hath covered בָֽגֶד׃ <WH899> with a garment

מֵעָנִ֞י <WH6041> from the poor הֵשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> [That] hath taken off יָד֗וֹ <WH3027> his hand נֶ֤שֶׁךְ <WH5392> usury וְתַרְבִּית֙ <WH8636> nor increase לֹ֣א <WH3808> does not לָקָ֔ח <WH3947> [that] hath not received מִשְׁפָּטַ֣י <WH4941> my judgments עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> hath executed בְּחֻקּוֹתַ֖י <WH2708> in my statutes הָלָ֑ךְ <WH1980> hath walked ה֗וּא <WH1931> he לֹ֥א <WH3808> he will not יָמ֛וּת <WH4191> he shall not die בַּעֲוֹ֥ן <WH5771> for the iniquity אָבִ֖יו <WH1> of his father חָיֹ֥ה <WH2421> he shall surely יִחְיֶֽה׃ <WH2421> live

אָבִ֞יו <WH1> [As for] his father כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because עָ֣שַׁק <WH6231> oppressed עֹ֗שֶׁק <WH6233> because he cruelly גָּזַל֙ <WH1497> spoiled גֵּ֣זֶל <WH1499> by violence אָ֔ח <WH251> his brother וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> what לֹא־ <WH3808> was not ט֛וֹב <WH2896> [that] which [is] not good עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> and did בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> among עַמָּ֑יו <WH5971> his people וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> behold מֵ֖ת <WH4191> lo even he shall die בַּעֲוֹנֽוֹ׃ <WH5771> in his iniquity

וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֕ם <WH559> Yet say מַדֻּ֛עַ <WH4069> Why לֹא־ <WH3808> not נָשָׂ֥א <WH5375> bear הַבֵּ֖ן <WH1121> ye Why? doth not the son בַּעֲוֹ֣ן <WH5771> the iniquity הָאָ֑ב <WH1> the father's וְהַבֵּ֞ן <WH1121> the son מִשְׁפָּ֧ט <WH4941> that which is lawful וּצְדָקָ֣ה <WH6666> and right עָשָׂ֗ה <WH6213> hath done אֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֻקּוֹתַ֥י <WH2708> all my statutes שָׁמַ֛ר <WH8104> [and] hath kept וַיַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> and hath done אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> חָיֹ֥ה <WH2421> them he shall surely יִחְיֶֽה׃ <WH2421> live

הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> The soul הַחֹטֵ֖את <WH2398> that sinneth הִ֣יא <WH1931> he תָמ֑וּת <WH4191> it shall die בֵּ֞ן <WH1121> The son לֹא־ <WH3808> nor יִשָּׂ֣א ׀ <WH5375> shall not bear בַּעֲוֹ֣ן <WH5771> the iniquity הָאָ֗ב <WH1> of the father וְאָב֙ <WH1> neither shall the father לֹ֤א <WH3808> nor יִשָּׂא֙ <WH5375> bear בַּעֲוֹ֣ן <WH5771> the iniquity הַבֵּ֔ן <WH1121> of the son צִדְקַ֤ת <WH6666> the righteousness הַצַּדִּיק֙ <WH6662> of the righteous עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> and תִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> become וְרִשְׁעַ֥ת <WH7564> shall be upon him and the wickedness [רָשָׁע כ] (הָרָשָׁ֖ע <WH7563> wicked ק) עָלָ֥יו <WH5921> and תִּֽהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> become ס

וְהָרָשָׁ֗ע <WH7563> But if the wicked כִּ֤י <WH3588> if יָשׁוּב֙ <WH7725> will turn מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all [חַטָּאתֹו כ] (חַטֹּאתָיו֙ <WH2403> sin ק) אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> that he hath committed וְשָׁמַר֙ <WH8104> and keep אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֻקּוֹתַ֔י <WH2708> all my statutes וְעָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> and do מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> that which is lawful וּצְדָקָ֑ה <WH6666> and right חָיֹ֥ה <WH2421> he shall surely יִחְיֶ֖ה <WH2421> live לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not יָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> he shall not die

כָּל־ <WH3605> All פְּשָׁעָיו֙ <WH6588> All his transgressions אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> that he hath committed לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִזָּכְר֖וּ <WH2142> they shall not be mentioned ל֑וֹ בְּצִדְקָת֥וֹ <WH6666> unto him in his righteousness אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> that he hath done יִֽחְיֶֽה׃ <WH2421> he shall live

הֶחָפֹ֤ץ <WH2654> Have I any pleasure אֶחְפֹּץ֙ <WH2654> at all מ֣וֹת <WH4194> the death רָשָׁ֔ע <WH7563> that the wicked נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> declares אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD הֲל֛וֹא <WH3808> rather בְּשׁוּב֥וֹ <WH7725> [and] not that he should return מִדְּרָכָ֖יו <WH1870> from his ways וְחָיָֽה׃ <WH2421> and live ס

וּבְשׁ֨וּב <WH7725> turneth away צַדִּ֤יק <WH6662> But when the righteous מִצִּדְקָתוֹ֙ <WH6666> from his righteousness וְעָ֣שָׂה <WH6213> and committeth עָ֔וֶל <WH5766> iniquity כְּכֹ֨ל <WH3605> to all הַתּוֹעֵב֜וֹת <WH8441> according to all the abominations אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשָׂ֧ה <WH6213> [and] doeth הָרָשָׁ֛ע <WH7563> that the wicked יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> [man] doeth וָחָ֑י <WH2425> shall he live כָּל־ <WH3605> to all [צִדְקָתֹו כ] (צִדְקֹתָ֤יו <WH6666> his righteousness ק) אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשָׂה֙ <WH6213> that he hath done לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תִזָּכַ֔רְנָה <WH2142> shall not be mentioned בְּמַעֲל֧וֹ <WH4603> in his trespass אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which מָעַ֛ל <WH4604> that he hath trespassed וּבְחַטָּאת֥וֹ <WH2403> and in his sin אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which חָטָ֖א <WH2398> that he hath sinned בָּ֥ם יָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> in them shall he die

וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֕ם <WH559> Yet ye say לֹ֥א <WH3808> is not יִתָּכֵ֖ן <WH8505> is not equal דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> The way אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> of the Lord שִׁמְעוּ־ <WH8085> Hear נָא֙ <WH4994> now בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> now O house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הֲדַרְכִּי֙ <WH1870> Is not my way לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִתָּכֵ֔ן <WH8505> equal הֲלֹ֥א <WH3808> not דַרְכֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1870> ? are not your ways לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִתָּכֵֽנוּ׃ <WH8505> unequal

בְּשׁוּב־ <WH7725> [man] turneth away צַדִּ֧יק <WH6662> When a righteous מִצִּדְקָת֛וֹ <WH6666> from his righteousness וְעָ֥שָׂה <WH6213> and committeth עָ֖וֶל <WH5766> iniquity וּמֵ֣ת <WH4191> and dieth עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> because בְּעַוְל֥וֹ <WH5766> in them for his iniquity אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> that he hath done יָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> shall he die ס

וּבְשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> [man] turneth away רָשָׁ֗ע <WH7563> Again when the wicked מֵֽרִשְׁעָתוֹ֙ <WH7564> from his wickedness אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> that he hath committed וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> and doeth מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> that which is lawful וּצְדָקָ֑ה <WH6666> and right ה֖וּא <WH1931> he אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשׁ֥וֹ <WH5315> his soul יְחַיֶּֽה׃ <WH2421> alive

וַיִּרְאֶ֣ה <WH7200> Because he considereth [וַיָּשֹׁוב כ] (וַיָּ֔שָׁב <WH7725> break ק) מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all פְּשָׁעָ֖יו <WH6588> from all his transgressions אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> that he hath committed חָי֥וֹ <WH2421> he shall surely יִחְיֶ֖ה <WH2421> live לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not יָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> he shall not die
